https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/oHyBTiXNClS29AW7QBX6pEKnNj0.jpg A recent widow living in a small Quebec town goes to Montreal to visit her busy adult son and daughter, and then on a whim decides to travel to the town of her childhood, where she hadn't set foot in decades. A Place to live
